description: Paris took this deli job as a last resort to help pay for her tuition. Her boss is not much older than her but he seems to think he can do whatever he wants including hitting on Paris. One night while putting away the display food and sloppy soup, Paris decides she's had enough of his advances and seduces him onto a locking table where she whips out her dick much to his surprise. At first he resists but Paris doesn't care she shoves her cock in his mouth and let's him know who the boss is now.
title: Paris and Prince
